statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, unit_price = 5.50 WHERE material_id = 1;

UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE transactions SET transaction_type = 'Sale', transaction_date = '2022-05-25' WHERE item_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = price * 1.05 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_info = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 25.5, quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE orders SET quantity = 20, order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE PrintMaterialsInventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE material_id = 1;

UPDATE materials SET location = 'Warehouse A', quantity = 50 WHERE material_type = 'Metal' AND quantity > 20;
